Inside the Waikaremoana Power Scheme https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/inside-the-waikaremoana-power-scheme/IR5V443FIZGKTC4PDFIRKE35DM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/inside-the-waikaremoana-power-scheme/IR5V443FIZGKTC4PDFIRKE35DM/ James PocockFor weeks after Cyclone Gabrielle, Hawke's Bay's power nearly all came from one place. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Genesis chief wholesale officer Tracey Hickman said the hydroelectric Waikaremoana Power Scheme, which generates 138MW of power, was the only major source of electricity generation for Hawke’s Bay and the East Coast for weeks after Cyclone Gabrielle.
